message: Bob, I have a very unique and valuable product that I believe would be of significant interest to you. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1000000 to me.  I'm offering it to you for $1500000.  This is a price that reflects the potential value I see in this product for you, but also allows for a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
